item.title: Do something
item.description: Inspired by from this awesome article, I started to make a personal mobile app.

item.title: About me
item.description: Currently, I’m working at Localize Direct Vietnam. We’re building an awesome application, named: Gridly. In case you want to hire me, you can view my CV online here. Or drop me email via honhattan90@gmail.com

item.title: Create my personal website at zero cost
item.description: By using Hugo and Gitbub-pages, you can build your own personal website without any cost!

item.title: CV
item.description: Education 2008 - 2012 BSc, Information Technology; University of Natural Sciences, HCMC Minor: Software Engineering Professional Summary B.Tech from the HCMC University of Natural Sciences (2008 - 2012). Hands-on more than 7 years of experience in java programming language and its related technologies. I have a strong background in programming, software analysis, and design. Critical thinking, produce code with good quality and maintainability. Good player, able to work independently as well as in a team.
